author: Kevin
title: Kevin
text: Very easy and straight forward. I was be able to passed the final exam with just one time. The other website I have try it and it cost me $25.00 for two try and still not able to passed the final exam. The question they have are hard and difficult to answer. After two try have fail, they want another $25.00 for two more try. That went I decide to google the internet and found traffic school for busy people and decided to try. I'm glass I did so.
